name: In re REAPPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING
name_abbreviation: In re Reappointment to the Pennsylvania Commission on Sentencing

parties: In re REAPPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING.

opinions.text:
ORDER
AND NOW, this 30th day of July, 1991, The Honorable Melvin G. Levy, Delaware County, is reappointed as a member of the Pennsylvania Commission on Sentencing for a two-year term commencing April 27, 1991.

casebody.head_matter:
593 A.2d 836
In re REAPPOINTMENT TO THE PENNSYLVANIA COMMISSION ON SENTENCING.
No. 97.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
July 30, 1991.
